subject: Web3
title: Treasury Management
description: Learn Treasury Management in one minute.

hook.text: Some DAOs control billions of dollars in their treasuries. Spending requires community approval through on-chain votes.

buildup.text: Treasury funds are held in smart contracts. No individual can withdraw funds without passing a governance proposal.

discovery.text: Proposals for grants, salaries, and partnerships are debated in forums before going to a formal on-chain vote.

twist.text: Most DAO treasuries are dominated by their own token. If the token price crashes, the treasury shrinks dramatically.

climax.text: Managing billions through community votes is messy. But every dollar spent is publicly visible and accountable.

punchline.text: Billions managed by vote. Every dollar tracked publicly.

quiz.question: What is a risk of DAO treasuries?
options: They're often dominated by the DAO's own token, which can crash
